title: Maps of Meaning and The Tower of Babel, Totalizing systems
description:
Alex and I continue our discussion of Jordan Peterson's letter to his Dad from p. 457 of Maps of Meaning and we consider the Tower of Babel and its possible meanings and consequences, both metaphorically and literally.
Link to Paul VanderKlay's talk with Jordan Peterson:  https://youtu.be/aUGGrZUFMg4
